name: OR_CASE_ALL_PROC
description: The OR_CASE_ALL_PROC table contains OR management system case procedures.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the procedure within the case.

columns.name: OR_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure record.

columns.name: OR_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: The free text comments for this procedure.

columns.name: DEFAULTED_LENGTH
columns.description: The length defaulted for this procedure by the system in minutes.

columns.name: RESOURCE_PREF_ID
columns.description: The procedure or preference card ID used to default the resources in the case for this procedure.

columns.name: RESOURCE_PREF_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: PICKLIST_PREF_ID
columns.description: The procedure or preference card ID used to default the pick list in the case for this procedure.

columns.name: PICKLIST_PREF_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: LENGTH_MODIFIED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the procedure length was modified by the user. Y indicates that the procedure length was modified. A null value indicates that the length was not modified. An N will not be populated for this column.

columns.name: MATCHED_PREF_ID
columns.description: This item stores the preference card that has been selected to override the defaulted preference card.

columns.name: MATCHED_PREF_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: POSSIBLE_PROC_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the procedure was flagged as a possible procedure. Y indicates that the procedure was flagged as a possible procedure. N or null indicates that the procedure was not flagged as a possible procedure.

columns.name: DBC_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Stores the Diagnose Behandel Combinatie (DBC) episode associated with the current procedure. Used in billing.

columns.name: PROC_EAP_ID
columns.description: Stores the ordered procedure (EAP) associated with the preference card.

columns.name: ALL_PROC_AS_ORDERED
columns.description: Specify the procedure name as exactly ordered by the surgeon/provider.

columns.name: ALL_PROC_CODE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the procedure (EAP) linked to the procedure code. This column is only populated for older surgical cases which were created and last modified before upgrading to the Epic Nov 2022 version. For newer surgical cases, codes are in OR_OPE_PROC_CODE.PROC_CODE_ID.  OR_CASE_ALL_PROC joins to OR_OPE_PROC_CODE on column ALL_PANEL_ADDL_OPE_ID.

columns.name: ALL_DEF_OR_PROC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the defaulted preference card.

columns.name: ALL_DEF_OR_PROC_ID_PROC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the surgical procedure record.

columns.name: PROC_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: This stores the procedure display name for the scheduled procedure.

columns.name: ALL_PANEL_ADDL_OPE_ID
columns.description: Stores the pointer to the procedure additional data record for all panels.
